example.eg: Students need to budget for accommodation, along with the cost of tuition.
example.egtrans: 学生们需要为住宿再加上学费做预算。

example.eg: Vicky went to the night club, along with her friend Cheryl.
example.egtrans: 维姬与她的朋友谢丽尔一起去了那家夜店。

example.eg: I get along very well with my mother-in-law.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 与…相处愉快, 合得来

example.eg: I usually just go along with what she says to avoid any arguments.
example.egtrans: 通常她说什么我就赞成什么，以避免发生争执。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 许可，允许, 同意，赞成

example.eg: Rachel is happy to go along with Harry's suggestion.
example.egtrans: 瑞秋很乐意支持哈利的建议。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 支持, 同意, 赞同

example.eg: Jim is a friendly guy who is easy to get along with.
